import React, { useState } from 'react'; /** * Navbar component * A simple responsive navigation bar containing the logo and links * to different sections of the page. On small screens a hamburger * button appears to toggle the navigation links. */ const Navbar = () => { const [open, setOpen] = useState(false); const toggleMenu = () => setOpen(!open); const handleLinkClick = () => setOpen(false); return (
NOVA MOVE
  • Qué hacemos
  • Servicios
  • Contacto
); }; export default Navbar;
